page.title: 04RECREATION
page.content: {Golf}is a very popular sport in this area.There are 4 courses 2 of them open to the General Public.The private courses are expensive to join and there is a long waiting list. They could be regarded as executive's clubs.The clubhouse is a social meeting place. Each village has it's own recreation grounds with{tennis courts}and{cricket {pitch}as well as a play area for children. Cricket is a very popular village sport. Badminton is played in the village halls. {Squash}has grown in popularity in the last 15 years and there is a Squash Club towards Wexham. {Riding}is also very popular.There is no Public Swimming Pool but people travel to the nearby Leisure Centres at Burnham and Slough. Some of the houses have pools in their gardens.
